word: [A FEW DAYS LATER ELLEN APPARENTLY CHANGED HER MIND AND JOINED HER HUSBAND FOR THE 1876 SUMMER CAMP MEETING SEASON. THEY MET 14 CAMP MEETING APPOINTMENTS, WORKING IN PERFECT HARMONY. RETURNING TO BATTLE CREEK, THEY MET PUBLISHING DEADLINES FOR SPIRIT OF PROPHECY, VOLUME 2. THEY WENT BACK TO CALIFORNIA TOGETHER, WHERE THEY AGAIN TOOK UP THE WORK THERE.]
